const int  N=1005//æŒ‡å®šå¹¶æŸ¥é›†æ‰€èƒ½åŒ…å«å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ˆç”±é¢˜æ„å†³å®šï¼‰int pre[N];     //å­˜å‚¨æ¯ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹ int rank[N];    //æ ‘çš„é«˜åº¦ void init(int n)     //åˆå§‹åŒ–å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯¹å½•å…¥çš„ nä¸ªç»“ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œåˆå§‹åŒ– {    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){        pre[i] = i;     //æ¯ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„ä¸Šçº§éƒ½æ˜¯è‡ªå·±         rank[i] = 1;    //æ¯ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹æ„æˆçš„æ ‘çš„é«˜åº¦ä¸º 1     } }int find(int x)          //æŸ¥æ‰¾ç»“ç‚¹ xçš„æ ¹ç»“ç‚¹ {    if(pre[x] == x) return x;  //é€’å½’å‡ºå£ï¼šxçš„ä¸Šçº§ä¸º xæœ¬èº«ï¼Œåˆ™ xä¸ºæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹     return find(pre[x]); //é€’å½’æŸ¥æ‰¾ }  int find(int x)     //æ”¹è¿›æŸ¥æ‰¾ç®—æ³•ï¼šå®Œæˆè·¯å¾„å‹ç¼©ï¼Œå°† xçš„ä¸Šçº§ç›´æ¥å˜ä¸ºæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ ‘çš„é«˜åº¦å°±ä¼šå¤§å¤§é™ä½ {    if(pre[x] == x) return x;//é€’å½’å‡ºå£ï¼šxçš„ä¸Šçº§ä¸º xæœ¬èº«ï¼Œå³ xä¸ºæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹     return pre[x] = find(pre[x]);   //æ­¤ä»£ç ç›¸å½“äºå…ˆæ‰¾åˆ°æ ¹ç»“ç‚¹ rootxï¼Œç„¶å pre[x]=rootx } bool isSame(int x, int y)      //åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦è¿é€š {    return find(x) == find(y);  //åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„æ ¹ç»“ç‚¹ï¼ˆå³ä»£è¡¨å…ƒï¼‰æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ }bool join(int x,int y){    x = find(x);//å¯»æ‰¾ xçš„ä»£è¡¨å…ƒ    y = find(y);//å¯»æ‰¾ yçš„ä»£è¡¨å…ƒ    if(x == y) return false;//å¦‚æœ xå’Œ yçš„ä»£è¡¨å…ƒä¸€è‡´ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ä»–ä»¬å…±å±åŒä¸€é›†åˆï¼Œåˆ™ä¸éœ€è¦åˆå¹¶ï¼Œè¿”å› falseï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºåˆå¹¶å¤±è´¥ï¼›å¦åˆ™ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œä¸‹é¢çš„é€»è¾‘    if(rank[x] > rank[y]) pre[y]=x;//å¦‚æœ xçš„é«˜åº¦å¤§äº yï¼Œåˆ™ä»¤ yçš„ä¸Šçº§ä¸º x    else//å¦åˆ™    {        if(rank[x]==rank[y]) rank[y]++;//å¦‚æœ xçš„é«˜åº¦å’Œ yçš„é«˜åº¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œåˆ™ä»¤ yçš„é«˜åº¦åŠ 1        pre[x]=y;//è®© xçš„ä¸Šçº§ä¸º y}return true;//è¿”å› trueï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºåˆå¹¶æˆåŠŸ}

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;class UnionFindSet{public:    UnionFindSet(int n)        : _ufs(n, -1)    {    }    // åˆå¹¶é›†åˆ    void Union(int x1, int x2)    {        int root1 = find_root(x1);        int root2 = find_root(x2);        if (root1 != root2)        {            // æ”¹è¿›ï¼šé»˜è®¤root1ä¸ºå¤§é›†åˆï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­root2æ˜¯å¦å¤§äºroot1            if (abs(_ufs[root1]) < abs(_ufs[root2]))                swap(root1, root2);            // root2 -> root1            _ufs[root1] += _ufs[root2];            _ufs[root2] = root1;        }    }    // æ‰¾é›†åˆçš„ä»£è¡¨å…ƒç´     int find_root(int x)    {        int root = x;        while (_ufs[root] >= 0)        {            root = _ufs[root];        }        // æ”¹è¿›ï¼šè·¯å¾„å‹ç¼©        while (_ufs[x] >= 0)        {            // è®°å½•çˆ¶äº²èŠ‚ç‚¹            int parent = _ufs[x];            // è®©è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›´æ¥æŒ‡å‘root            _ufs[x] = root;            x = parent;        }        return root;    }    // æ˜¯å¦åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆä¸­    bool isinset(int x1, int x2)    {        return find_root(x1) == find_root(x2);    }    // è®¡ç®—é›†åˆä¸ªæ•°    int setsize()    {        int size = 0;        for (auto i : _ufs)        {            if (i < 0)                size++;        }        return size;    }private:    vector<int> _ufs;};

primç®—æ³•

//primeç®—æ³•//å°†åŸå¸‚Xæ ‡è®°ä¸ºvisit=trueæ—¶ï¼Œå°±è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥åŸå¸‚åŠ å…¥åˆ°é›†åˆUï¼Œç”¨sumç´¯åŠ è®°å½•è¾¹çš„æ€»è´¹ç”¨#include<iostream>#define NO 99999999   //99999999ä»£è¡¨ä¸¤ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´ä¸å¯è¾¾#define N 5using namespace std;bool visit[N];long long money[N] = { 0 };long long graph[N][N] = {0};void initgraph(){for (int i = 0; i < N; i++){for (int j = 0; j < N; j++){scanf(" %lld", &graph[i][j]);}}}void printgraph(){for (int i = 0; i < N; i++){for (int j = 0; j < N; j++){printf(" %lld", graph[i][j]);}}}int prim(int city){initgraph();printgraph();int index = city;int sum = 0;int i = 0;int j = 0;cout <<"è®¿é—®èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š" <<index << "\n";memset(visit, false, sizeof(visit));visit[city] = true;for (i = 0; i < N; i++){money[i] = graph[city][i];//åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªä¸åŸå¸‚cityé—´ç›¸è¿çš„è´¹ç”¨å­˜å…¥moneyï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åç»­æ¯”è¾ƒ}for (i = 1; i < N; i++){int minor = NO;for (j = 0; j < N; j++){if ((visit[j] == false) && money[j] < minor)  //æ‰¾åˆ°æœªè®¿é—®çš„åŸå¸‚ä¸­ï¼Œä¸å½“å‰æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ä¸­çš„åŸå¸‚é—´è´¹ç”¨æœ€å°çš„åŸå¸‚{minor = money[j];index = j;}}visit[index] = true;cout << "è®¿é—®èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š" << index << "\n";sum += minor; //æ±‚æ€»çš„æœ€ä½è´¹ç”¨/*è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´æ–°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœªè®¿é—®åŸå¸‚ä¸å½“å‰åŸå¸‚é—´çš„è´¹ç”¨æ›´ä½ï¼Œå°±æ›´æ–°money,ä¿å­˜æ›´ä½çš„è´¹ç”¨*/for (j = 0; j < N; j++){if ((visit[j] == false) && money[j]>graph[index][j]){money[j] = graph[index][j];}}}cout << endl;return sum;               //è¿”å›æ€»è´¹ç”¨æœ€å°å€¼}int main(){cout << "ä¿®è·¯æœ€ä½æ€»è´¹ç”¨ä¸ºï¼š"<< prim(0) << endl;//ä»åŸå¸‚0å¼€å§‹return 0;}

//kruskalç®—æ³•#include<cstdio>#include<iostream>#include<cstring>#include<cstdlib>#include<algorithm>#include<cmath>#include<map>#include<set>#include<list>#include<vector>using namespace std;#define N 10005#define M 50005#define qm 100005#define INF 2147483647struct arr{int ff, tt, ww;}c[M << 1];// å­˜å‚¨è¾¹çš„é›†åˆï¼Œffï¼Œttï¼Œwwä¸ºä¸€æ¡ä»ffè¿æ¥åˆ°ttçš„æƒå€¼ä¸ºwwçš„è¾¹ int tot = 0;//è¾¹çš„æ€»æ•° int ans = 0;//æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„æƒå€¼å’Œ int f[N];//å¹¶æŸ¥é›† bool comp(const arr & a, const arr & b){return a.ww < b.ww;}int m, n;//è¾¹æ•°é‡ï¼Œç‚¹æ•°é‡ int getfa(int x){return f[x] == x ? x : f[x] = getfa(f[x]);}//å¹¶æŸ¥é›†ï¼Œå¸¦è·¯å¾„å‹ç¼©  inline void add(int x, int y, int z){c[++tot].ff = x;c[tot].tt = y;c[tot].ww = z;return;}//æ–°å¢ä¸€æ¡è¾¹ void kruscal(){for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) f[i] = i;for (int i = 1; i <= m; i ++){int fx = getfa(c[i].ff);//å¯»æ‰¾ç¥–å…ˆ int fy = getfa(c[i].tt);if (fx != fy){//ä¸åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œåˆå¹¶åŠ å…¥ä¸€æ¡è¾¹ f[fx] = fy;ans += c[i].ww;}}return;} int main(){freopen("input10.txt", "r", stdin);freopen("output10.txt", "w", stdout);scanf("%d%d",&n, &m);int x, y, z;for (int i = 1; i <= m; i ++){scanf("%d %d %d", &x, &y, &z);add(x, y, z);}sort(c + 1, c + 1 + m, comp);//å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº kruscal();printf("%d\n", ans);return 0;}

#include<vector>using namespace std;//åˆå§‹åŒ–    vector<int> a;//å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªvectorï¼Œæœªåˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºã€‹ 0    vector<int> a(3);//å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º3çš„vectorï¼Œæœªåˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºã€‹0 0 0    vector<int> a(10, 3); //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º10ï¼Œä¸”æ¯ä¸ªæ•°èµ‹å€¼ä¸º3vector<int> a(b.begin(),b.begin+3);//å°†å‘é‡bä¸­ä»ä¸‹æ ‡0 1 2ï¼ˆå…±ä¸‰ä¸ªï¼‰çš„å…ƒç´ èµ‹å€¼ç»™aï¼Œaçš„ç±»å‹ä¸ºintå‹//ä»æ•°ç»„ä¸­è·å¾—åˆå€¼int b[7]={1,2,3,4,5,6,7};vector<int> a(b,b+7ï¼‰;    a.size()//è¿”å›å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°    a.resize()//æ”¹å˜å¤§å°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œå‚æ•°count,value    a.reserve()//é¢„ç•™ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä¸æ”¹å˜å…¶å½“å‰çš„å¤§å°    a.empty();//åˆ¤æ–­aæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç©ºåˆ™è¿”å›trueï¼Œéç©ºåˆ™è¿”å›false    a.front(); if(!a.empty())//è¿”å›açš„ç¬¬1ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ,å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“å­˜åœ¨    a.back(); if(!a.empty())//è¿”å›vectorçš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°    a.clear();//æ¸…ç©ºaä¸­çš„å…ƒç´     a.pop_back();//åˆ é™¤aå‘é‡çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´     a.push_back(5);//åœ¨açš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå‘é‡åæ’å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå…¶å€¼ä¸º5    a.emplace_back();    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i ++) {a.push_back(i);}    //ä¸‰ç§éå†vectorçš„æ–¹æ³•    for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i ++) {cout << a[i] << ' '; }    for (auto i = a.begin(); i != a.end(); i ++) {cout << *i << ' ';}    for (auto x : a) {cout << x << ' ';}//C++11çš„æ–°è¯­æ³•       //ç»“åˆç®—æ³•erase() reverse()    #include<algorithm>     a.erase(p)//ä»aä¸­åˆ é™¤è¿­ä»£å™¨pæŒ‡å®šçš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œpå¿…é¡»æŒ‡å‘cä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªçœŸå®å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸èƒ½æ˜¯æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ end()    a.erase(b,e)//ä»aä¸­åˆ é™¤è¿­ä»£å™¨å¯¹bå’Œeæ‰€è¡¨ç¤ºçš„èŒƒå›´ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œè¿”å›e    vector<int> a={1,2,3,4,5};    reverse(a.begin(),a.end());//açš„å€¼ä¸º5ï¼Œ4ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ2ï¼Œ1  å€’ç½®                      // vector æœ‰é‡è½½=ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªvectoræ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´                  vector<int> sCount(26);    vector<int> pCount(26);    pCount[3] = 0;    if (sCount == pCount) cout<<"1";        // é‡è¦ï¼švectoråµŒå¥—    int m = 10;    vector < string > s;     vector < vector < string > > hashmap ( m,s ) ;

int lower_bound(vector<int>& A, int target) {    int left = 0, right = A.size();    while(left < right) {        int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);        if(A[mid] < target) left = mid + 1;        else right = mid;    }    return left;}int upper_bound(vector<int>& A, int target) {    int left = 0, right = A.size();    while(left < right) {        int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);        if(A[mid] <= target) left = mid + 1;        else right = mid;    }    return left;}

long long solve(long long a, long long b, long long p){    long long ans = 1;    long long base = a;    while(b)    {        if (b & 0x1)         {            ans *= base;            ans %= p;        }        base *= base;        base %= p;        b >>= 1;    }    return ans;}

#include <iostream>using namespace std; class Distance{   private:      int feet;             // 0 åˆ°æ— ç©·      int inches;           // 0 åˆ° 12   public:      // æ‰€éœ€çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°      Distance(){         feet = 0;         inches = 0;      }      Distance(int f, int i){         feet = f;         inches = i;      }      // æ˜¾ç¤ºè·ç¦»çš„æ–¹æ³•      void displayDistance()      {         cout << "F: " << feet << " I:" << inches <<endl;      }      // é‡è½½è´Ÿè¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼ˆ - ï¼‰      Distance operator- ()        {         feet = -feet;         inches = -inches;         return Distance(feet, inches);      }    // é‡è½½å°äºè¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼ˆ < ï¼‰      bool operator <(const Distance& d)      {         if(feet < d.feet)         {            return true;         }         if(feet == d.feet && inches < d.inches)         {            return true;         }         return false;      }};int main(){   Distance D1(11, 10), D2(-5, 11);   -D1;                     // å–ç›¸åæ•°   D1.displayDistance();    // è·ç¦» D1   -D2;                     // å–ç›¸åæ•°   D2.displayDistance();    // è·ç¦» D2        if( D1 < D2 )   {      cout << "D1 is less than D2 " << endl;   }   else   {      cout << "D2 is less than D1 " << endl;   }   return 0;}// ans// F: -11 I:-10// F: 5 I:-11// D2 is less than D1

#include <iostream>using namespace std;class Box{   public:      double getVolume(void)      {         return length * breadth * height;      }      void setLength( double len )      {          length = len;      }      void setBreadth( double bre )      {          breadth = bre;      }      void setHeight( double hei )      {          height = hei;      }      // é‡è½½ + è¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼Œç”¨äºæŠŠä¸¤ä¸ª Box å¯¹è±¡ç›¸åŠ       Box operator+(const Box& b)      {         Box box;         box.length = this->length + b.length;         box.breadth = this->breadth + b.breadth;         box.height = this->height + b.height;         return box;      }   private:      double length;      // é•¿åº¦      double breadth;     // å®½åº¦      double height;      // é«˜åº¦};// ç¨‹åºçš„ä¸»å‡½æ•°int main( ){   Box Box1;                // å£°æ˜ Box1ï¼Œç±»å‹ä¸º Box   Box Box2;                // å£°æ˜ Box2ï¼Œç±»å‹ä¸º Box   Box Box3;                // å£°æ˜ Box3ï¼Œç±»å‹ä¸º Box   double volume = 0.0;     // æŠŠä½“ç§¯å­˜å‚¨åœ¨è¯¥å˜é‡ä¸­   // Box1 è¯¦è¿°   Box1.setLength(6.0);    Box1.setBreadth(7.0);    Box1.setHeight(5.0);   // Box2 è¯¦è¿°   Box2.setLength(12.0);    Box2.setBreadth(13.0);    Box2.setHeight(10.0);   // Box1 çš„ä½“ç§¯   volume = Box1.getVolume();   cout << "Volume of Box1 : " << volume <<endl;   // Box2 çš„ä½“ç§¯   volume = Box2.getVolume();   cout << "Volume of Box2 : " << volume <<endl;   // æŠŠä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ç›¸åŠ ï¼Œå¾—åˆ° Box3   Box3 = Box1 + Box2;   // Box3 çš„ä½“ç§¯   volume = Box3.getVolume();   cout << "Volume of Box3 : " << volume <<endl;   return 0;}// ans// Volume of Box1 : 210// Volume of Box2 : 1560// Volume of Box3 : 5400

#include<iostream>#include<vector>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;const int N=1e5+5,INF=0x3f3f3f3f; int main(){    vector<int> a;vector<int> b,c;    string f,g;    cin>>f>>g;    for(int i=f.size()-1;i>=0;--i)    {        int x=f[i]-'0';        a.push_back(x);    }    for(int i=g.size()-1;i>=0;--i)    {        int x=g[i]-'0';        b.push_back(x);    }    int n=max(a.size(),b.size());    int t=0;     for(int i=0;i<a.size()||i<b.size();++i)     {         if(i<a.size())t+=a[i];         if(i<b.size())t+=b[i];         c.push_back(t%10);         t=t/10;     }     if(t!=0)     {         c.push_back(1);        n++;     }    for(int i=n-1;i>=0;--i)    {        cout<<c[i];    }    return 0;}

minus

#include<iostream>#include<vector>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include <limits.h>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;bool cmp(vector<int> n, vector<int>m){if (n.size() != m.size())return n.size() > m.size();for (int i = n.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)if (n[i] != m[i])return n[i] > m[i];return true;}vector<int> sub(vector<int>& a, vector<int>& b) {vector<int>c; int t = 0;for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); ++i){t = a[i] - t;if (i<b.size())t -= b[i];c.push_back((t + 10) % 10);if (t < 0)t = 1;else t = 0;}while (c.size() > 1 && c.back() == 0)c.pop_back();return c;}int main(){vector<int> a, b, C;string A, B;cin >> A >> B;for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {a.push_back(A[i] - '0');}for (int i = B.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)b.push_back(B[i] - '0');if (cmp(a, b))C = sub(a, b);else {C = sub(b, a);printf("-");}for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {cout << C[i];} return 0;}

multiply

#include<iostream>#include<vector>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include <limits.h>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;vector<int> cheng(vector<int>& A, int& B) {vector<int>c; long long t = 0;for (int i = 0; i < A.size() || t; ++i){    if(i<A.size())t += A[i] * B;c.push_back(t % 10);t = t / 10;} return c;}int main(){vector<int> a;string A;int b;cin >> A >> b;if (b == 0){cout << '0';return 0;}for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {a.push_back(A[i] - '0');}    auto c = cheng(a, b);for (int i = c.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {cout << c[i];} return 0;}

div

#include<iostream>#include<vector>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include <limits.h>using namespace std;const int N=1e5+5,INF=0x3f3f3f3f;int t=0;vector<int> cu(vector<int>&A,int&B){    vector<int>c;    for(int i=A.size()-1;i>=0;--i)    {        t=A[i]+t*10;        c.push_back(t/B);        t=t%B;    }    reverse(c.begin(),c.end());    while(c.size()>1&&c.back()==0)c.pop_back();    return c;}int main(){    vector<int> a;    string A;int b;    cin>>A>>b;    for(int i=A.size()-1;i>=0;--i){        a.push_back(A[i]-'0');    }    auto c=cu(a,b);    for(int i=c.size()-1;i>=0;--i){        cout<<c[i];    }    cout<<"\n"<<t;    return 0;}

7.1 UDPå¥—æ¥å­—ç¼–ç¨‹

# Clientfrom socket import * def main():    serverName = '127.0.0.1'#æœ¬æœºIP    serverPort = 12000#ç«¯å£    clientSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM)#IPV4,UDP    message = input("Input lowercase sentence:")    clientSocket.sendto(message.encode(), (serverName,serverPort))    modifiedMessage,serverAddress = clientSocket.recvfrom(2048)    print(modifiedMessage.decode())    clientSocket.close()    return if __name__ == "__main__":    main()    # Serverfrom socket import * def main():    serverPort = 12000    serverSocket = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_DGRAM)    serverSocket.bind(('',serverPort))    message,clientAddress = serverSocket.recvfrom(2048)    modifiedMessage = message.decode().upper()    serverSocket.sendto(modifiedMessage.encode(),clientAddress) if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

7.2 TCPå¥—æ¥å­—ç¼–ç¨‹

# Clientfrom socket import * def main():    serverName = '127.0.0.1'    serverPort = 12000    clientSocket = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM)#IPv4,TCP    clientSocket.connect((serverName,serverPort))#å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥    sentence = input("Input lowercase sentence:")    clientSocket.send(sentence.encode())#å·²å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦åœ°å€äº†    modifiedSentence = clientSocket.recv(2048)    print("From Server:",modifiedSentence.decode())    clientSocket.close() if __name__ == '__main__':    main()# Serverfrom socket import * def main():    serverPort = 12000    serverSocket = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM)    serverSocket.bind(('',serverPort))    serverSocket.listen(1)#æ¬¢è¿å¥—æ¥å­—ï¼Œç­‰å¾…å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥    print("The server is ready to receive")    while(1):        connectionSocket,addr = serverSocket.accept()#å®¢æˆ·ä¸“ç”¨å¥—æ¥å­—        sentence = connectionSocket.recv(2048).decode()        modifiedSentence = sentence.upper()        connectionSocket.send(modifiedSentence.encode())        connectionSocket.close() if __name__ == "__main__":    main()
